title: (x) Looking for a digital version of Hellenic Wide - various {Dav}
content:
is there no digital version of this?  
myfonts, google don't seem to come up with the right thing.  
and the knock-offs don't seem to maintain the original's charm...

just curious  
/aaron
author: a2z

comments.content:
Did you do [a search on Typophile](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112229/http:/typophile.com/search).?  
_( There will be 'quite a few' suggestions for alternate, digitally available typefaces.. )_

Dav

See here

[http://www.typophile.com/node/14434](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112229/http:/www.typophile.com/node/14434 "http://www.typophile.com/node/14434")

Clandestine retroactive linking, huh Dav?

Okay then, Ill quote myself, quoting myself.: _'..If you are looking for a 'Hellenic' revival, you may want to consider some of these.: ' [Antique Central](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112229/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/aboutype/antique-central/)', ' [Antique Extended](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112229/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-antique-extended/)', ' [Hefty](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112229/http:/www.buyfonts.com/value_for_money/hefty.htm)', ' [HiFi Stereo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112229/http:/hem.passagen.se/spsweet/font2/stereo.html)' ( Free ), ' [Platon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112229/http:/www.csaimages.com/results.asp?image=FNT018&wwwflag=&imagepos=18)', and, ' [Zapata](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112229/http:/www.letterror.com/foundry/zapata/index.html)'..'_ :)

Dav

_Edit-A-Bit.: Hah, thats kinda niiice.. I dont have to actually type out my replies.. From now on, I shall copy and paste previous made replies.. :)_

yeah i tried searching typophile, but mostly came up with broken links to threads.

many of the "revivals" are a bit different it seems.  
so i guess the answer is "no?"

/aaron

I like 58 Rodeo which is not on the above list.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/baselinefonts/58-rodeo/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018112229/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/baselinefonts/58-rodeo/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/baselinefonts/58-rodeo/")
